body.p: In November 2004 the International Accounting Standards Board issued IFRIC 2 Members’ Shares in Co‑operative Entities and Similar Instruments. It was developed by the Interpretations Committee.

variants.p: Other Standards have made minor consequential amendments to IFRIC 2. They include Annual Improvements to IFRSs 2009–2011 Cycle (issued May 2012), IFRS 13 Fair Value Measurement (issued May 2011), IFRS 9 Financial Instruments (Hedge Accounting and amendments to IFRS 9, IFRS 7 and IAS 39) (issued November 2013) and IFRS 9 Financial Instruments (issued July 2014).
